snippet: As the civil war in Syria rages on, the risk that Israel will be drawn into the fray is rising.
abstract: Op-Ed article by policy expert David Pollack holds, as Syrian civil war rages on, risk that Israel will be drawn into the fray is rising; maintains to prevent that, United States should broker tacit agreement between Israel and moderate elements of the Syrian opposition.
lead_paragraph: As the civil war in Syria rages on, the risk that Israel will be drawn into the fray is rising.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
